column5: This listing is for the Master En-Suite, featuring a luxurious king sized bed & spa-like bathroom with jacuzzi tub & separate shower. It is one of three rooms in a centrally located modern townhouse just minutes from downtown Houston.   The room & entire home features upscale amenities to make your visit comfortable & enjoyable. In addition to the room, you will get access to the spacious open concept kitchen & living room, & a rooftop deck w/ breathtaking views.
column8: Very Large Beautiful En-Suite Master Bedroom
